google.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to put a word or words into the Googleâ„¢  search engine in order to search for information on the Internet
google.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: I googled her name and found out she runs her own company.
google.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a very popular search engine (=computer program that allows you to search for information on the Internet). Google also provides other Internet services including e-mail, maps, social networking, and video sharing.
